ftueAnalysis.criterion: Splash Screen to Interactive Game Time
ftueAnalysis.observations: Detailed observations from the video regarding loading times and transition.
ftueAnalysis.suggestedImprovements: If 'No' or 'Partial', suggest specific improvements. Otherwise, null or empty string.

numericalValue.timeInSeconds: [Number] Total time in seconds from splash screen to interactive game. Null if not measurable.

ftueAnalysis.observations: Description of loading screen durations observed, examples if too long.
ftueAnalysis.suggestedImprovements: Suggestions for reducing loading times or adding engaging elements during loading.

numericalValue.maxDurationInSeconds: [Number] Maximum duration of any single loading screen in seconds. Null if not measurable.

ftueAnalysis.observations: Description of whether explanations were provided before permission requests, and the quality of the explanation.
ftueAnalysis.suggestedImprovements: If 'No', recommend adding explanations and suggest what information to include.

numericalValue.permissionsRequestedWithoutExplanationCo: [Number] Count of permission requests shown without prior explanation. 0 if all explained, Null if not applicable.

ftueAnalysis.observations: Indicate if the tutorial is skippable and how easy it is to find/use the skip option.
ftueAnalysis.suggestedImprovements: If 'No', strongly recommend adding a skip option.

numericalValue.isSkippable: [Boolean - true/false] True if tutorial is skippable, false otherwise. Null if not applicable.

ftueAnalysis.observations: Note if the game language matches the device language and if there are any inconsistencies.
ftueAnalysis.suggestedImprovements: If 'No', recommend ensuring language consistency across all text elements.

numericalValue.isLanguageConsistent: [Boolean - true/false] True if language is consistent, false otherwise. Null if not applicable.

ftueAnalysis.observations: Details about login requirements, explanations (if any), and login options available.
ftueAnalysis.suggestedImprovements: Suggestions for improving login flow, explanations, or options.

numericalValue.isLoginMandatory: [Boolean - true/false] True if login is mandatory, false otherwise. Null if not applicable.
numericalValue.loginOptionsCount: [Number] Number of login options provided if login is mandatory. Null if not mandatory or not measurable.

ftueAnalysis.observations: Describe the implementation of automatic Google Play Services login (if present and applicable).
ftueAnalysis.suggestedImprovements: Suggestions for improving automatic login or making it more user-friendly.

numericalValue.isAutomaticGoogleLogin: [Boolean - true/false] True if automatic Google Play Services login is implemented, false otherwise. Null if not applicable.

ftueAnalysis.observations: Describe the frequency, types, and intrusiveness of interstitials and purchase modals observed.
ftueAnalysis.suggestedImprovements: Suggestions for reducing interstitial frequency, modal size, or improving their presentation.

numericalValue.interstitialCount: [Number] Number of interstitial ads shown during FTUE. 0 if none, Null if not applicable.
numericalValue.purchaseModalCount: [Number] Number of purchase modals shown during FTUE. 0 if none, Null if not applicable.

ftueAnalysis.observations: Describe how options are accessed and if the button/menu is easily discoverable.
ftueAnalysis.suggestedImprovements: If 'No', suggest making options more prominent and accessible.

numericalValue.isOptionsAccessible: [Boolean - true/false] True if options are easily accessible, false otherwise. Null if not applicable.

ftueAnalysis.observations: Describe how gameplay is initiated and the clarity of the 'Start Game' mechanism or entry point.
ftueAnalysis.suggestedImprovements: Suggestions for making the start game process clearer and more intuitive.

numericalValue.isStartGameClear: [Boolean - true/false] True if the start game process is clear, false otherwise. Null if not applicable.

ftueAnalysis.observations: Describe the visibility and customization options of the user profile.
ftueAnalysis.suggestedImprovements: Suggestions for improving profile visibility and customization options.

numericalValue.isProfileVisible: [Boolean - true/false] True if profile is visible, false otherwise. Null if not applicable.
numericalValue.isProfileCustomizable: [Boolean - true/false] True if profile is customizable, false otherwise. Null if not applicable.

ftueAnalysis.observations: Note any instances of screens without loading feedback for more than 3 seconds, and the duration.
ftueAnalysis.suggestedImprovements: Recommend adding loading indicators to screens that might take longer than 3 seconds to load.

numericalValue.instancesWithoutFeedbackCount: [Number] Number of instances where loading feedback was missing for >3 seconds. 0 if none, Null if not applicable.
